hexbox.title: HexBox
hexbox.subtitle: 3D volumetric hexahedral mesh modeling tool based on the box-modeling paradigm.

voodo.title: VooDo
voodo.subtitle: UI scripting framework for animation, data binding and prototyping on the §WinUI 3§ platform, based on a custom hybrid imperative-declarative compiled language derived from §C#§. It integrates a dedicated compiler and runtime into the §WinUI§ build process using §.NET Source Generators§ and §Roslyn§.

tdm.title: TDM Project
tdm.subtitle: Full-stack architecture for participatory environmental data collection. It comprises a customized back-end for route optimization and time-series storage, along with a mobile application designed with gamification in mind.

downhill.title: Downhill
downhill.subtitle: Mobile and desktop videogame featuring physics simulations, procedural terrain generation, fully polygonal graphics, and online leaderboard.

tygo.title: Tygo
tygo.subtitle: Mobile videogame with fully polygonal graphics and procedural animations, developed from scratch for §OpenGL ES§.

junkyard-arena.title: Junkyard Arena
junkyard-arena.subtitle: Multiplayer desktop §Unity§ videogame with custom networking based on the authoritative server paradigm, featuring client-side prediction and server reconciliation.

tdm-indoor.title: TDM Project (indoor)
tdm-indoor.subtitle: Full-stack architecture for querying and visualizing time series of indoor environmental data.

bdp-image-classifier.title: BDP Image Classifier
bdp-image-classifier.subtitle: Parallel Bag-of-Visual-Words image classifier implemented with §Apache Spark§ on §AWS EMR§.

quizbot.title: QuizBot
quizbot.subtitle: Telegram bot leveraging Knowledge Graphs for generating quizzes and Natural Language Processing techniques for accepting answers in natural language.

pidby.title: Pidby
pidby.subtitle: PDF creator from web pages with built-in §Pug§, §EJS§, §Sass§ and §TypeScript§ support. Used to create this CV.

led-racing.title: LED Racing Game
led-racing.subtitle: Videogame for AVR microcontrollers entirely written in assembly language, including an additional desktop and mobile USB configurator tool based on §Qt Quick§.
